user.title: EcoGuard Configuration
user.description: Enter your EcoGuard Curves credentials to connect.

data_description.username: Your username or object number used to log in to EcoGuard Curves.
data_description.domain: Your EcoGuard Curves domain code (e.g., 'SkrentenBrl'). This is typically found in your EcoGuard Curves URL or provided by your energy provider.
data_description.nord_pool_area: Your Nord Pool pricing area code (e.g., 'NO1' for Oslo, 'SE3' for Stockholm). This is used for electricity price data. [Find your area on the Nord Pool map]({nord_pool_link}).

error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to EcoGuard. Please check your credentials and domain.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication credentials. Please check your username and password.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: This EcoGuard domain is already configured.

common.description_consumption_daily_meter: Last known daily consumption for this specific meter. Data may be delayed by up to a day.
common.description_cost_daily_metered: Daily cost for this meter based on actual API data. Data may be delayed by up to a day.
common.description_cost_daily_estimated: Estimated daily cost for this meter calculated from consumption and pricing data.
common.description_consumption_daily_aggregated: Aggregated daily consumption across all meters for this utility type. Data may be delayed by up to a day.
common.description_cost_daily_aggregated_metere: Aggregated daily cost across all meters for this utility type, based on actual API data.
common.description_cost_daily_aggregated_estima: Estimated aggregated daily cost across all meters for this utility type.
common.description_consumption_daily_combined_w: Combined hot and cold water daily consumption across all meters.
common.description_cost_daily_combined_water_me: Combined hot and cold water daily cost based on actual API data.
common.description_cost_daily_combined_water_es: Estimated combined hot and cold water daily cost.
common.description_consumption_monthly_aggregat: Total consumption for the current month, aggregated across all meters for this utility type.
common.description_cost_monthly_aggregated_mete: Monthly cost aggregated across all meters for this utility type, based on actual API data.
common.description_cost_monthly_aggregated_esti: Estimated monthly cost aggregated across all meters for this utility type, using Nord Pool spot prices for electricity.
common.description_consumption_monthly_meter: Monthly consumption for this specific meter for the current month.
common.description_cost_monthly_meter_metered: Monthly cost for this specific meter based on actual API data.
common.description_cost_monthly_meter_estimated: Estimated monthly cost for this specific meter.
common.description_consumption_monthly_combined: Combined hot and cold water monthly consumption for the current month.
common.description_cost_monthly_combined_water_: Combined hot and cold water monthly cost based on actual API data.
Estimated combined hot and cold water monthly cost.
common.description_cost_monthly_other_items: General fees and charges from the most recent billing period available.
common.description_cost_monthly_estimated_final: Estimated final monthly bill settlement based on current consumption patterns and mean daily values.
common.description_cost_monthly_total_metered: Total monthly cost across all utilities, based on actual API data.
common.description_cost_monthly_total_estimated: Total monthly cost across all utilities, including estimated costs where actual data is not available.
common.description_reception_last_update: Timestamp of the last data reception for this measuring point.
